casebody.data:
No. 10-6844. Jack E. Allen, Petitioner v. Randall E. Britton, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Houtzdale, et al. 562 U.S. 1111, 131 S. Ct. 823, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9800.

178 L. Ed. 2d 562,

December 13, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
